text: Mustafa Semavi Eyice (December 9, 1922 in Istanbul, Turkey â€“ May 28, 2018 in Istanbul, Turkey) was a Turkish art historian and archaeologist. He worked in the study of Byzantine and Ottoman art in Istanbul. Professor Eyice was thought as the pioneer of Byzantine studies in Turkey. ==References== Category:Writers from Istanbul Category:1922 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Archaeologists Category:Art historians Category:Turkish historians Category:Turkish academics Category:Istanbul University alumni
